events.name: President Biden's address at the Arab summit
events.wd_label: President Biden's address at the Arab summit
events.wd_description: President Joe Biden addressed the Arab summit, affirming the United States' commitment to being an active partner in the Middle East and urging leaders to view human rights as a catalyst for economic and social change.
events.description: President Joe Biden addressed the Arab summit, affirming the United States' commitment to being an active partner in the Middle East and urging leaders to view human rights as a catalyst for economic and social change.

events.name: Biden's commitment
events.wd_description: President Joe Biden emphasized that the United States would remain an active and engaged partner in the Middle East, highlighting the importance of human rights.
events.description: President Joe Biden emphasized that the United States would remain an active and engaged partner in the Middle East, highlighting the importance of human rights.

events.name: focus of Biden's Middle East trip
events.wd_label: focus of Biden's Middle East trip
events.wd_description: Biden's first trip to the Middle East as President focused on the summit with six Gulf states, Egypt, Jordan, and Iraq, downplaying a meeting with Saudi Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman.
events.description: Biden's first trip to the Middle East as President focused on the summit with six Gulf states, Egypt, Jordan, and Iraq, downplaying a meeting with Saudi Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman.

events.name: goal of the Saudi Arabia visit
events.wd_label: goal of the Saudi Arabia visit
events.wd_description: Biden's visit to Saudi Arabia aimed to strike a deal on oil production to help reduce gasoline prices and combat inflation.
events.description: Biden's visit to Saudi Arabia aimed to strike a deal on oil production to help reduce gasoline prices and combat inflation.

events.name: Nancy Pelosi's visit to Taiwan
events.wd_description: US House Speaker Nancy Pelosi visited Taiwan, marking the most senior US politician visit in 25 years, prompting strong reactions from China.
events.description: US House Speaker Nancy Pelosi visited Taiwan, marking the most senior US politician visit in 25 years, prompting strong reactions from China.

events.name: Pelosi's visit
events.wd_description: Nancy Pelosi, the most senior US politician to visit Taiwan in 25 years, met with leaders in Taipei's capital.
events.description: Nancy Pelosi, the most senior US politician to visit Taiwan in 25 years, met with leaders in Taipei's capital.

events.name: Chinese government's response
events.wd_description: The Chinese government accused the United States of violating China’s sovereignty under the guise of democracy, with Foreign Minister Wang Yi issuing a warning.
events.description: The Chinese government accused the United States of violating China’s sovereignty under the guise of democracy, with Foreign Minister Wang Yi issuing a warning.

events.name: Pelosi's statement
events.wd_description: Nancy Pelosi stated that China cannot prevent world leaders from traveling to Taiwan to respect its democracy, highlight its successes, and reaffirm commitment to collaboration.
events.description: Nancy Pelosi stated that China cannot prevent world leaders from traveling to Taiwan to respect its democracy, highlight its successes, and reaffirm commitment to collaboration.

events.name: Biden's disapproval
events.wd_description: President Joe Biden, Pelosi's party colleague, did not approve of her visit, stating that the American military felt it was "not a good idea right now" due to high tensions with China.
events.description: President Joe Biden, Pelosi's party colleague, did not approve of her visit, stating that the American military felt it was "not a good idea right now" due to high tensions with China.

events.name: Zelenskiy meets US Congressional delegation in Kyiv
events.wd_label: Zelenskiy meets US Congressional delegation in Kyiv
events.wd_description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy met with a senior US Congressional delegation in Kyiv, promising continued support in the war against Russia.
events.description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy met with a senior US Congressional delegation in Kyiv, promising continued support in the war against Russia.

events.name: Zelenskiy’s meeting
events.wd_description: President Zelenskiy met with a senior US Congressional delegation, including Adam Smith, chair of the House Armed Services Committee.
events.description: President Zelenskiy met with a senior US Congressional delegation, including Adam Smith, chair of the House Armed Services Committee.

events.name: US delegation’s statement
events.wd_description: The US delegation stated that the United States, along with allies and partners, has provided economic, military, and humanitarian assistance to Ukraine.
events.description: The US delegation stated that the United States, along with allies and partners, has provided economic, military, and humanitarian assistance to Ukraine.

events.name: additional military aid
events.wd_description: US Secretary of Defense Lloyd Austin announced the provision of four additional high mobility artillery rocket systems to Ukraine, bringing the total provided so far to 16.
events.description: US Secretary of Defense Lloyd Austin announced the provision of four additional high mobility artillery rocket systems to Ukraine, bringing the total provided so far to 16.

events.name: Panasonic's expansion in EV battery production
events.wd_label: Panasonic's expansion in EV battery production
events.wd_description: Panasonic is increasing its battery production capacity to meet rising EV demand, particularly from its major customer, Tesla.
events.description: Panasonic is increasing its battery production capacity to meet rising EV demand, particularly from its major customer, Tesla.

events.name: investment plans
events.wd_description: Panasonic plans to invest 400 billion yen ($2.9 billion) in growth areas including automotive batteries and supply chain software.
events.description: Panasonic plans to invest 400 billion yen ($2.9 billion) in growth areas including automotive batteries and supply chain software.

events.name: new production facilities
events.wd_description: Panasonic is expanding its production facilities, including a new production campus in Reno, Nevada, and additional capacity at Tesla’s Gigafactory 1 in Sparks, Nevada.
events.description: Panasonic is expanding its production facilities, including a new production campus in Reno, Nevada, and additional capacity at Tesla’s Gigafactory 1 in Sparks, Nevada.

events.name: t: Reno production campus
events.wd_description: Panasonic Energy of North America announced plans to build a production campus in Reno, Nevada.
events.description: Panasonic Energy of North America announced plans to build a production campus in Reno, Nevada.

events.name: t: Gigafactory 1 expansion
events.wd_description: Panasonic is expanding its existing production at Tesla’s Gigafactory 1 in Sparks, Nevada, to meet increasing demand.
events.description: Panasonic is expanding its existing production at Tesla’s Gigafactory 1 in Sparks, Nevada, to meet increasing demand.

events.name: government incentives
events.wd_description: New government funding, including $3.1 billion from the Biden administration for battery manufacturing, recycling, and second-life incentives, is supporting the production push.
events.description: New government funding, including $3.1 billion from the Biden administration for battery manufacturing, recycling, and second-life incentives, is supporting the production push.

events.name: t: Kansas incentives
events.wd_description: The Panasonic project received incentives through Kansas’ Attracting Powerful Economic Expansion program, expected to create an estimated 4,000 jobs.
events.description: The Panasonic project received incentives through Kansas’ Attracting Powerful Economic Expansion program, expected to create an estimated 4,000 jobs.

events.name: t: DOE funding
events.wd_description: The Biden administration made $3.1 billion available for battery and component manufacturing, recycling, and second-life incentives through the Department of Energy.
events.description: The Biden administration made $3.1 billion available for battery and component manufacturing, recycling, and second-life incentives through the Department of Energy.
